definitions.title: n. m.
definitions.body: :Ct So 7:13 blossom of grape (just at flowering Duval:REJ xiv (1887), 227 ff. NH id.; Aram. [[סמדר]], smuwdo0, Mand. [[סימאדרא]] Nö:M. 128);—alw. abs. ´[[ס]], only Ct: [[הַגְּפָנִים]] [[סְמָדַâר]] So 2:13 the vines are (all) blossom; [[כְּרָמִים]] [[סְמָדַָר]] v:So 2:15 (on bold predicate cf. Ges:§ 141 d); [[פִּתַּךְִ]] [[הַסְּמָêַדר]] So 7:13 the blossom has opened (its buds).
